name: UniDexAI
description: UniDexAl The most advanced decentralized exchange on Ethereum. Trade in a manner similar to Uniswap, but with the added benefits of fully integrated Al contract audits, comprehensive charting, detailed order books, live pair scanning and filtering, among many other features. Live Features Own your own keys If you use trading bots such as maestro, banana gun & unibot, you are exposing your private keys and your crypto can be stolen. UniDexAl, does not use or store your private key, you approve every transaction from your chosen wallet. Trade like a pro Experience the ultimate trading platform on Ethereum. Buy, sell, and explore a diverse range of tokens with ease. Our platform combines user-friendly interfaces with advanced technologies to deliver a seamless trading experience. Access detailed and user-friendly charts for precise market analysis, helping you make informed trading decisions. View real-time order books with comprehensive market depth, enabling effective trade execution and strategy planning.
